      • get_neighbors

        public static java.util.ArrayList<mapNode> get_neighbors(com.cycapservers.game.GameState g,
                                                         mapNode node,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<mapNode> closed_list,
                                                         java.util.ArrayList<mapNode> open_list)
        Gets the list of neighbors for the node
        Parameters:
        g - GameState reference
        node - reference to the node that it needs to find neighbors for
        closed_list - list of previously explored nodes
        open_list - list of nodes that it has recognized that it still needs to explore
        Returns:
        a list of nodes that are neighbors to the node that this function was sent
